籤詩版本二:
UMentingji ujabule kakhulu, futhi umnyango wezenzo ezinhle uyachuma.
Zonke izinto zihamba kahle emkhakheni womshado, futhi lapho isifo sihlangene nomuthi omangalisayo, uzophila
詩意:
Le hexagram imele iphupho lasentwasahlobo elinamakhulu ezimbali.
Konke kuba kuhle uma uhlangana nomuntu ohloniphekile.

(Le hexagram iwuphawu lokubungaza okuhle.
Konke kuhamba kahle.
)
解曰: Intwasahlobo ijulile futhi nelanga lifudumele. Izimbali ziqhakaza zodwa. Ungangabazi. Kuvela kubantu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Usuku lokuzalwa luka-Guo Fenyang
UGuo Ziyi, ujenene omkhulu woBukhosi BamaTang kanye neNkosi yaseFenyang, wenze iphathi yosuku lokuzalwa. Izihlobo nabangane beza bezohalalisela, futhi isimo sasigcwele injabulo nenjabulo.
聖意: Ikhaya lomndeni liyachuma, umuntu uphephile, ingcebo iyachuma, ibhizinisi liyaphumelela, umshado uyaphumelela, uLiujia uvimba izimanga, abahamba ngezinyawo baya emasimini, izikelemu ziyachuma, imfuyo iyaphumelela, abantu batholakala, amacala iwinile, ukufuduka kuyaphumelela, izinto ezilahlekile zifunwa ngokushesha, izifo ziyi-Anshan, ithuna liyinhlanhla
